alert.note: Alert for Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 1:55PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Smith County through 230 PM CST... At 155 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raleigh, or 18 miles northeast of Magee, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pineville around 215 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for central and east central Mississippi.
